modName: Wizards Fury And Shors War Bow
summary: Adds a new bow with arrows, plus a new spell!
descriptionHtml:
If you've already completed the M.Q (Main Quest) or if you haven't been bothered to, You need to use the center-on-cell (COC) command to get to Sovngarde. You will find a statue near the broken word wall. The bow and some arrows are in front of the statue, which you need to disable in order to get the scroll containing Wizard's Fury. Some rules for using Shor's War Bow:

1- The bow contains immense power, too powerful for even the Dovahkiin.

2- Don't shoot it too close to yourself without god mode on.

3- Have fun!

If someone can help me make a dungeon to put this in it would be awesome! I suck at making dungeons and houses and stuff, so that's why I'd like some help. All that needs to be done is the actual building and some ambushes. I can do the rest.
author: Shiddlepong aka Riley Beaven
